materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Dalada Maligawa or Temple of Buddha's Tooth in Kandy, Sri Lanka. The photograph shows the front of the temple from the left. There is a brick patterned wall in front of the temple. A man is kneeling on the steps leading up to the entrance. The octagon of the temple is seen at the back, with a man leading on one of the open doorways. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Dalada Maligawa, Temple of Buddha's Tooth, Kandy, Ceylon
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Kandy (Sri Lanka) Buddhism religious structures Temple of the Tooth (Kandy, Sri Lanka)
